intent_data.goal: Fix postcode lookup functionality, improve postcode lookup UI, resolve login issues (Kenan cannot log in), and verify account creation works with just username or email (email not required)

requirements.description: Fix postcode lookup functionality - not working
Improve postcode lookup UI - user reports UI is awful
Resolve login issues - Kenan cannot log in, need to check other logins
Verify/fix account creation - ensure accounts can be created with just username OR email (email not required)

requirements_summary: 4 requirements total: 2 Critical (postcode fix, login fix) and 2 High (UI improvement, account creation verification). All requirements are explicit bug fixes or UI improvements with clear scope.

routing_decision.reason: Bug fixes with focused scope (4 specific issues), low file complexity (8/60), low-medium characteristics (15/40). Score 23/100 falls in Simple category (0-40 range). QUICK discovery is appropriate for debugging and focused fixes.

foundation_components.baseline_intent: Fix postcode lookup functionality, improve postcode lookup UI, resolve login issues (Kenan cannot log in), and verify account creation works with just username or email (email not required)

priority_order.requirement_1_priority: ABSOLUTE FIRST - Must be fixed and deployed before other requirements
priority_order.deployment_requirement: REQ-003 must be deployed before starting REQ-001, REQ-002, or REQ-004
